item.title: Free (almost) Aws Ec2 Instance
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Create a free Linux EC2 instance Free Trial: Try Amazon EC2 t4g.small instances powered by AWS Graviton2 processors free for up to 750 hours / month until Dec 31st 2023. https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/new-t4g-instances-burstable-performance-powered-by-aws-graviton2/ Although the instance is free, but I have been charge a few cents per day under category of “EC2 - Other” for type of EBS:VolumeUsage.gp2. There is no free tier or trail for EBS as far as I know.
